experiences.title: Generation Connect Youth Envoy
experiences.description: Arranged internship focused on telecommunications and digital transformation initiatives for youth empowerment across Africa and globally.

Collaborated with international stakeholders on digital divide solutions

experiences.title: Embedded System Intern

experiences.title: Engineering Intern, E-waste Recycling Project
experiences.description: Part of a team working on repurposing e-waste to create functional computers for underprivileged communities. Responsible for woodworking and operating systems installation and configuration.
achievements: Refurbished 100+ computers from electronic waste
Provided functional computers to 20+ schools in underserved communities
Reduced electronic waste by implementing systematic recycling processes
Trained community members in basic computer maintenance and repair

experiences.title: Computer Trainer
experiences.description: Tutored students at netlabs in computer repair, hardware diagnostics, and operating system installation. Provided hands-on training in technical troubleshooting.
achievements: Trained 15+ students in computer repair techniques
Developed comprehensive training curriculum for hardware diagnostics
Achieved 95% student satisfaction rate in training programs
Created practical troubleshooting guides for common computer issues

experiences.title: Engineering, Software Development and Data Analysis Intern
experiences.description: Arranged internship focusing on sustainable technology solutions, software development for environmental applications, and data analysis for green initiatives.

Analyzed data for 10+ green technology projects
Created automated reporting systems for sustainability metrics
Contributed to carbon footprint reduction strategies

experiences.title: Chairperson Makerere University Student Branch
